questions.text: How do I typically respond to unexpected change?
choices: I embrace it and adapt quickly
I need time to process and adjust
I resist initially but come around
I struggle and need extra support

questions.text: What helps me navigate difficult life transitions?
choices: Focusing on what I can control

questions.text: When facing a major challenge, what do I need most?
choices: Space to figure it out myself

questions.text: How do I prefer we handle challenges that affect us both?
choices: Face them as a united team
Divide and conquer based on strengths

questions.text: What's my relationship with failure and setbacks?
choices: I see them as learning opportunities
They're hard but I eventually bounce back
I'm working on being more resilient
